author: Special Correspondent
text:
Former MP M. Ramadass has called for the constitution of a Puducherry Subordinate Services Selection Board (PSSSB) to manage the recruitment process for Group B and C posts in a fair and transparent manner.

In a statement, he said that Puducherry being a Union Territory was not permitted to establish a Public Service Commission though it is at liberty to set up a Subordinate Services Selection Board as in the case of the Government of Delhi .
title: Ex-MP seeks Subordinate Services Selection Board
